biography: Pasi, also known as "Susi-Pasi", is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Vuosaari Golf Helsinki his home club.
He has consistently demonstrated his skill and prowess at the Hector Trophée, participating in the 2025, 2024, and 2022 editions of the tournament.
His most notable achievement is his victory at the 2024 Hector Trophée, solidifying his position as a formidable competitor in this prestigious annual event.
While he hasn't yet claimed the Victor trophy for the best individual performance, his consistent presence in the Hector Trophée and past victory make him a player to watch in the years to come.
